text: Gunnar Utterberg (28 November 1942 – 12 September 2021) was a Swedish sprint canoer. He was born in Jönköping, Sweden. He competed in 1000 m doubles and fours at the 1964, 1968 and 1972 Olympics. He won a gold medal in the doubles event in 1964. Utterbeg died on 12 September 2021, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Canoeists Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden Category:People from Jönköping
title: Gunnar Utterberg
